text: Virrat is a city in Finland. As of 31 May 2013, 7,344 people lived there. Nearby municipalities are Alavus, Keuruu, Kihniö, Mänttä-Vilppula, Ruovesi, Seinäjoki, Ylöjärvi and Ähtäri. ==Some villages== *Härkönen (Virrat) *Jäähdyspohja *Ikkala (Virrat) *Killinkoski *Lahdenkylä (Virrat) *Liedenpohja *Rantakunta *Vaskuu *Vaskivesi *Äijänneva ==Population growth== http://pxweb2.stat.fi/Dialog/varval.asp?ma=060_vaerak_tau_107&ti;=V%E4est%F6+kielen+mukaan+sek%E4+ulkomaan+kansalaisten+m%E4%E4r%E4+ja+maa%2Dpinta%2Dala+alueittain+1980+%2D+2012&path;=../Database/StatFin/vrm/vaerak/⟨=3&multilang;=fi Reference ==References== == Other websites == * The official page Category:Cities in Finland Category:Municipalities of Pirkanmaa
title: Virrat
